body_html:
Both the Placeholder and Const ops do have shape inference functions registered. Thus, they can be added to the ShapeRefiner.

Closing this issue, feel free to re-open if I have misunderstood your question.
body_text:
Both the Placeholder and Const ops do have shape inference functions registered. Thus, they can be added to the ShapeRefiner.
Closing this issue, feel free to re-open if I have misunderstood your question.
body:
Both the [Placeholder](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/38adca7ebb40b8cd56b841af2f6b8a44c71f2a82/tensorflow/core/ops/array_ops.cc#L2359) and [Const](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/38adca7ebb40b8cd56b841af2f6b8a44c71f2a82/tensorflow/core/ops/array_ops.cc#L335) ops do have shape inference functions registered. Thus, they can be added to the ShapeRefiner.

Closing this issue, feel free to re-open if I have misunderstood your question.
